With over 4,100 participating companies from all over the world, it is the world's largest voluntary corporate citizenship initiative.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"How does EPAM contribute to the Global Goals?\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"rgb(26, 156, 176)\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At EPAM, we use our capabilities and expertise to serve our communities around us. Within our own activities we have identified where we have the biggest potential to contribute to the Global Goals, given the nature, scale and reach of our business, and how this will add value to our business.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"And we defined social responsibility, often abbreviated \\\"CSR,\\\" is a corporation's initiatives to assess and take responsibility for the company's effects on environmental and social wellbeing\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Taking the CSR principles, EPAM is focusing on the impacts of its operations not only on profits but the society and environment at large. Our education, environment, and community programs make a global impact and we have the power to make a difference in the communities around
